item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi! Iâ€™m Mark and welcome to my cyber security blog! To provide some context, I’m at the beginning of my career in the cyberspace so what better way to log my progress than through a blog!? I intend to share snippets of home brewed projects along with topics that I personally find interesting, and think are worth sharing. At this point in time, I am one of the first to have completed a NCSC verified Cyber Degree Apprenticeship program run at The University Of The West Of England whilst working in a Risk and Governance role withing the public sector.
